mapper.select: SELECT challenge_id AS challengeId, difficulty_code AS difficultyCode, required_success_days AS requiredSuccessDays, daily_target_value AS dailyTargetValue, reward_title_id AS rewardTitleId FROM challenge_rules WHERE challenge_id = #{challengeId} AND difficulty_code = #{difficultyCode}

SELECT cr.difficulty_code AS difficultyCode, cr.required_success_days AS requiredSuccessDays, cr.daily_target_value AS dailyTargetValue,
t.id AS rewardTitleId, t.name AS rewardTitleName, t.description AS rewardTitleDescription, t.icon_emoji AS rewardTitleIconEmoji FROM challenge_rules cr LEFT JOIN titles t ON t.id = cr.reward_title_id WHERE cr.challenge_id = #{challengeId} ORDER BY FIELD(cr.difficulty_code, 'BEGINNER', 'INTERMEDIATE', 'ADVANCED')
